auth.loginDescription: Select your calendars, and we'll take care of the rest.
auth.logoutSuccessMessage: You have been successfully logged out. We hope to see you again soon.

calendarSelector.title: Calendar Selection
calendarSelector.description: Select calendars for availability checking. We only check free/busy slots, not event content.
calendarSelector.tokenNotFound: Please login again to authorize calendar access.
calendarSelector.tokenExpired: Your Google Calendar access has expired. Please login again to re-authorize.
calendarSelector.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
calendarSelector.fetchError: Unable to fetch calendars. Please try again.
calendarSelector.atLeastOneRequired: At least one calendar must be selected

accountSettings.name: Name:
accountSettings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
accountSettings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
accountSettings.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

linguistProfile.description: Set your hourly rate, currency, language pairs, and specialization areas.
linguistProfile.currencyReadOnly: Currency selection will be available with currency exchange support

dashboard.linguistsDescription: Here is the schedule from {{startDate}} until {{endDate}} included.
dashboard.availabilityDescription: Those available can commit to {{hours}}-hour shifts.
dashboard.availabilityDescriptionNoHours: Those available can commit to shifts.
dashboard.name: Name

ratingInput.saveError: Failed to update rating. Please try again.

filters.title: Filters
filters.projectSizeHint: Filter linguists with at least {{hours}} free hours
filters.projectSizeTooltip: Estimated hours are calculated based on a standard 40-hour work week. This is a rough estimate - actual availability varies by linguist (working hours, weekends, holidays). Use the 'Available (Xh)' shown on linguist cards for precise availability.
filters.useEstimatedHours: Click to use estimated {{hours}} hours based on selected date range (40h/week calculation)

booking.title: Book {{name}}
booking.description: Provide project details to send a booking request. The linguist must be available for the entire availability window.
booking.noSlotsAvailable: No available time slots in the selected range.
booking.attachmentNote: Note: Please attach the calendar file (booking.ics) that will be downloaded.
booking.availabilityWindowNote: The linguist must be available for the entire project duration shown above.
booking.emailBodyIntro: I would like to book you for the following project:
booking.emailBodyClosing:
Please confirm your availability for the entire project duration.

Best regards

errors.title: Errors occurred while checking availability
errors.n8nWorkflowInactive: The n8n workflow is not active. Please activate the workflow in n8n.
errors.n8nServiceUnavailable: The n8n service is currently unavailable.
errors.networkError: Unable to reach the availability service. The service may be down.
errors.authenticationError: Authentication failed. Please check your API configuration.
errors.unknownError: An error occurred while checking availability.
errors.vaultPermissionDenied: Unable to retrieve authentication tokens. The server's access to the token store has expired. Please contact your administrator.
errors.vaultError: Unable to connect to the token store. Please try again later or contact your administrator.
errors.tokenNotFound_one: No calendar access token found for {{count}} linguist ({{emails}}). They need to log in again with their Google account.
errors.tokenNotFound_other: No calendar access tokens found for {{count}} linguists ({{emails}}). They need to log in again with their Google accounts.
errors.tokenExpired_one: The calendar access token has expired for {{count}} linguist ({{emails}}). They need to log in again with their Google account.
errors.tokenExpired_other: The calendar access tokens have expired for {{count}} linguists ({{emails}}). They need to log in again with their Google accounts.
errors.googleApiError: Unable to check calendar availability. Google Calendar returned an error.
errors.invalidRefreshToken_one: The refresh token has been revoked or is no longer valid for {{count}} linguist ({{emails}}). They need to re-authenticate by logging in again with their Google account and re-selecting their calendars in the settings page.
errors.invalidRefreshToken_other: The refresh token has been revoked or is no longer valid for {{count}} linguists ({{emails}}). They need to re-authenticate by logging in again with their Google account and re-selecting their calendars in the settings page.
errors.missingCredentials_one: Calendar IDs or authentication not available for {{count}} linguist ({{emails}}). Please ask them to login again with their Google account, select their calendars and click "Save calendars" button in the settings page.
errors.missingCredentials_other: Calendar IDs or authentication not available for {{count}} linguists ({{emails}}). Please ask them to login again with their Google account, select their calendars and click "Save calendars" button in the settings page.

login.title: Let's make it easy to work together.
login.subtitle: Great to see you!

settings.title: Manage Your Account
settings.subtitle: Welcome {{userName}}! Customize your preferences and availability.

footer.aboutText: LinguistNow simplifies the hassle of finding available linguists for translation projects. Whether you're a project manager in a translation agency or a linguist seeking new opportunities, LinguistNow provides the tools you need to streamline your workflow and connect with the right people at the right time.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your Privacy Matters to Us
privacyPolicy.introductionText: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application. We are committed to protecting your personal data and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this policy, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at nicmart@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.infoWeCollectText1: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the application, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when you participate in activities on the application, or otherwise when you contact us.
privacyPolicy.infoWeCollectText2: The personal information we collect may include the following:
privacyPolicy.nameContactData: Name and Contact Data: We collect your name, email address, and profile picture when you log in to your Google Account.
privacyPolicy.calendarAccess: Google Calendar Access: To enable the application's functionality, we request access to your Google Calendar. We ask for permission to view your calendar events solely to get a list of calendar IDs and check your availability using Google's Freebusy API. We do not read or store the details of your calendar events.
privacyPolicy.useOfInfoText1: We use the information we collect or receive:
privacyPolicy.useOfInfoItem1: To facilitate account creation and logon process.
privacyPolicy.useOfInfoItem2: To check against the provided list of calendars in Google Calendar if you are free or busy at a given date and time.
privacyPolicy.sharingInfoText1: We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis:
privacyPolicy.sharingInfoItem1: Consent: We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose.
privacyPolicy.sharingInfoItem2: Legitimate Interests: We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
privacyPolicy.sharingInfoItem3: Performance of a Contract: Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract.
privacyPolicy.sharingInfoItem4: Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.
privacyPolicy.rightsText: You have certain rights under applicable data protection laws, including the right to access, correct, update, or delete the personal information we have about you. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at nicmart@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at nicmart@gmail.com.

availabilitySettings.offDaysHint: Select the days you do not work

errors.invalidStartHour: Working hours start must be between 0 and 23
errors.invalidEndHour: Working hours end must be between 0 and 23
errors.startAfterEnd: Working hours start must be before end

availabilitySettings.workingHoursHint24h: Select your working hours in 24-hour format (0-23)
